body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to our support team. My name is Joshua Wilson and I work for Smoothstay Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Mary Hernandez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. To assist you better, may I please have your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is mary.hernandez@example.com and my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Mary. I have noted your email address as mary.hernandez@example.com and your phone number as five five five, one two three, four five six seven. Is there anything specific you need assistance with regarding your recent visit to our hotel?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have some concerns about the pricing during my stay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Mary. Can you please provide more details about the pricing issues you encountered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The room rates were higher than what was initially quoted to me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Mary. Let me look into this matter further. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Mary. I will investigate the pricing discrepancy and get back to you soon. Have a great day!
